<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <v-card variant="outlined" width="300">
        <template v-slot:title> {{ title }} </template>
        <template v-slot:subtitle> {{ date }} </template>
        <template v-slot:text> {{ contents }} </template>
        <v-card-actions>
          <v-btn variant="outlined" @click="reveal = true"> Read full </v-btn>
        </v-card-actions>

        <v-expand-transition>
          <v-card v-if="reveal" class="v-card--reveal" style="height: 200%">
            <template v-slot:text> egg </template>
          </v-card>
        </v-expand-transition>
      </v-card>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
